Attributes.description: Theory and research on the evolution of the human mind, with emphasis on implications for cognition and behaviour in contemporary environments.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: Either (a) PSYC 100 or (b) two of PSYC 101, PSYC 102, PSYC 205, PSYC 207, PSYC 208, PSYC 216, PSYC 217, PSYC 277. (Strongly recommended: PSYC 102 and either PSYC 216 or one of PSYC 217 or 277.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Wed, Start Time: 17:00, End Time: 20:00, Building: Pharmaceutical, Room: Sciences
